description:
<p><span>We have an exciting opportunity for Registered Nurses within the Division of Surgery at The Mid Yorkshire Hospitals NHS Trust. The service is developing a COVID-19 swabbing service across the Trust to support the restart of planned services for investigative procedures, day cases and inpatient treatments. The service will operate seven days per week across three sites of Dewsbury, Pinderfields and Pontefract Hospitals. Both full time and part-time positions are available.</span></p>
<p><span>The Trust strives to provide excellent patient experience each and every time. Equally we are dedicated in supporting you in your professional development and will work with you to help you achieve new skills and competencies. The Division of Surgery is made up of supportive and friendly teams that are proud of the excellent standards of care delivered.</span></p>
title: Registered Nurse
